Honeydew, Jicama, and Mango Salad Recipe | Bon Appétit

Place a cut side down and remove rind by slicing down along the curve of the melon with a sharp knife, rotating as you go.Step 2Using a mandoline or a sharp knife, thinly slice melon into rings.Step 3Toss melon, jicama, and mango on a platter with lime juice; season generously with salt.
